Posts.Content: Xeloda side effects: Henna tip for Hand-Foot Syndrome (HFS or PPE)   THis seems to work for people.
Posts.Title: Anybody on Xeloda? Any advice?

Posts.Content: Hi I was wondering if anyone has taken Xelode for a long time.  My sister was Dx stage III in 2006 and now cancer has spread to the bones.  Dr. put her on 2,000/Xelode.  The medicine makes her nasusea.  When will they test her to see in the Xelode is working?  I have heard wonderful things about this drug if you can handle the side effects.  Thanks!
Posts.Title: Xelode
